page.title: 08THE EXCELSIOR SILVER BAND
page.content: The Okehampton Band was started many years ago. Originally there were two town bands, before they joined to become the Excelsior Band. Today we attend contests competing against lots of other bands. In November 1984 we won first prize in the fourth section taking us into the third section, with our rival band, Hatherleigh. We also attend fetes and carnivals, and visit Westward Ho! each summer. We don't collect much money but we do entertain. We have about 30 members, one man having been in the band over 50 years. Next year we hope to go to Weisseling our twin town in Germany to stay and perform with their band. MARION STAPLETON
